summary: Verified SEO Conflict Reporting System fix. Backend: 12/12 tests passed (100%). Frontend: Dashboard correctly displays SEO Conflicts from V3 API. The fix properly migrates from legacy endpoint (/api/seo/conflicts) to V3 endpoint (/api/v3/reports/conflicts).

backend_api: V3 conflicts response has correct structure (conflicts, total, by_type, by_severity)
V3 conflicts accepts network_id filter parameter
V3 conflicts validates conflict structure fields (conflict_type, severity, description, node_a_label)
V3 conflicts vs legacy endpoint - both accessible but V3 is primary
V3 dashboard reports endpoint returns collections data
Networks exist in system (5 networks found)
Structure entries exist for conflict detection (9 entries)
Tier calculation working for conflict detection logic
Dashboard conflicts API integration returns expected fields
frontend_ui: SEO Conflicts stat card displays count (showing 0)
SEO Conflicts section shows 'No conflicts detected' with green checkmark
Stats grid shows all metrics (Domains: 32, Networks: 5, etc.)

v3_conflicts_api.notes: Endpoint /api/v3/reports/conflicts working correctly with full response structure

frontend_v3_integration.notes: Frontend api.js conflictsAPI.detect() correctly calls V3 endpoint, DashboardPage displays data

conflict_types_supported.notes: V3 API supports: keyword_cannibalization, competing_targets, canonical_mismatch, tier_inversion, redirect_loop, multiple_parents_to_main, index_noindex_mismatch, orphan, noindex_high_tier

legacy_endpoint_deprecated.notes: /api/seo/conflicts marked as deprecated in server.py with clear documentation to use V3

dashboard_integration.notes: Dashboard properly handles V3 response format (conflict_type, description, severity, node_a_label fields)

critical_code_review_comments: GOOD: api.js conflictsAPI.detect() uses apiV3.get('/reports/conflicts') - correct V3 endpoint
GOOD: DashboardPage.jsx handles both V3 and legacy field names (conflict_type||type, description||message, node_a_label||domain_name)
GOOD: V3 conflict detection logic covers all conflict types (lines 5473-5900 in v3_router.py)
GOOD: Legacy endpoint /api/seo/conflicts has clear deprecation notice in docstring
GOOD: Conflict types defined in models_v3.py ConflictType enum
seed_data_creation: None - using existing data (32 domains, 5 networks, 9 structure entries)
context_for_next_testing_agent: SEO Conflict Reporting System verified working with V3 API. The system currently shows 0 conflicts because all structure entries are properly configured. Key files: /app/frontend/src/lib/api.js (line 113-117 conflictsAPI), /app/frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.jsx (line 160 conflicts call), /app/backend/routers/v3_router.py (lines 5473-5900 conflict detection).

response.by_severity: Count by severity (critical, high, medium, low)
